data.eml:eml: Atydina, a new genus for Caridina atyoides Nobili, 1900, from Indonesia (Crustacea: Decapoda: Atyidae) *

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cai, Yixiong (2010): Atydina, a new genus for Caridina atyoides Nobili, 1900, from Indonesia (Crustacea: Decapoda: Atyidae) *. Zootaxa 2372: 75-79, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.193714
